entries.journal_entry_description: You heard about all the pieces to the fryer and created a schematic based on the information.
entries.journal_entry_title: Find out more about the Fryer
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The broken device used to be owned by Hunde Decan. Maybe he can assist you in fixing the fryer or making a new one.  Meet Hunde on Lok.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Hunde said that Amyva Va'new may have more details about the fryer. Meet Amyva on Talus.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Amyva said you might get more information from Mikfa Faaus. Meet with Mikfa on Naboo.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Mikfa said addtional details can be attained from someone named Eteto Topan. Meet Eteto on Tatooine.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Eteto said that Kerhi hi-Lak has details of the fryer construction. Meet Kerhi on Tatooine.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Kerhi says that Tombl Blaus can provide more fryer details.  Meet Tombl on Rori.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Tombl mentioned that someone named Lepwalk C'han has extensive knowledge of fryers. Meet Lepwalk on Dantooine.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Yet another person to talk to.  How many people will this take? Meet Nore on Yavin 4.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Nore said that a droid named Otonon Tracks used to construct the fryers. Meet Otonon on Endor.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Finally, I might get some answers.
